CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Frequency_Type__c) == 'Bi-Weekly' , Amount__c * 26, IF( TEXT(Frequency_Type__c) == 'Semi-Monthly' , Amount__c * 24, IF( TEXT(Frequency_Type__c) == 'Weekly' , Amount__c * 52, IF( TEXT(Frequency_Type__c) == 'Monthly', Amount__c * 12, IF( TEXT(Frequency_Type__c) == 'Quarterly', Amount__c * 4, IF( TEXT(Frequency_Type__c) == 'Annually', Amount__c * 1, 0) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Annualized
